Individuals meet inclusion criterion randomize mean computer program three study group : 1 ) Prebiotic group : Oral supplementation 6g/day prebiotic 15 day . 2 ) Synbiotic group : Oral supplementation 6g/day synbiotic 15 day . 3 ) Placebo group ( control ) : Oral supplementation 6g/day placebo ( maltodextrin ) 15 day . Will assess effect supplementation plasma cytokine , plasma lipopolysaccharide ( bacterial endotoxin ) , plasma cellular fatty acid profile , metabolic parameter ( lipid profile , glycemic status insulin resistance ) nutritional status .
